Items.Title: Resolution concerning the establishment of the Hudson Square Business Improvement District in the Borough of Manhattan and setting the date, time and place for the public hearing to hear all persons interested in the establishment of such district.

Items.Title: Resolution concerning the establishment of the Hudson Square Business Improvement District in the Borough of Manhattan and setting the date, time and place for the public hearing to hear all persons interested in the establishment of such district.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
